content.text: Build an airline booking system with seat selection

Building a multi-page airline booking system with seat selection feature. The system will have a homepage to select flight details, a seat selection page with interactive seat map, and a confirmation page. Using Tailwind CSS for modern responsive styling and Font Awesome icons for UI enhancement. Seat selection will be dynamic with JavaScript, including seat availability states and the ability to select/deselect seats. Navigation pills and buttons will be included for smooth flow. Each page will link to the others for easy navigation. The files will be separated: HTML files for each page, CSS files for styling, and JS files for logic. The seat selection will be a grid with interactive seats. The booking system will be mobile-first and fully responsive. A subtle 'Made by Odoe' pill will be included on every page.
